00015 #ifndef __V4INFO_H__
00016 #define __V4INFO_H__
00017 
00018 #include "v4_types.h"
00019 #include "v4file.h"
00020 
00021 static void print_codec_info(void)
00022 {
00023     int rc;
00024     int build, magic;
00025     v4_caps_info_t caps;
00026 
00027     // print codec library version
00028     v4_get_version(&build, &magic);
00029     verbose_print(0, "VSofts H.264 Codec build %d (%d)\n", build, magic);
00030 
00031     // print capabilities
00032     rc = v4_get_caps(&caps, sizeof(caps));
00033     if (rc == VSSH_OK)
00034     {
00035         // OS
00036         char *os = "n/a";
00037         char *cc = "cc";
00038         switch (caps.platform_info.os)
00039         {
00040         case V4OS_WIN: os = "win"; break;
00041         case V4OS_LIN: os = "lin"; break;
00042         case V4OS_MAC: os = "mac"; break;
00043         }
00044         switch (caps.platform_info.cc)
00045         {
00046         case V4CC_MSC: cc = "msc"; break;
00047         case V4CC_ICC: cc = "icc"; break;
00048         case V4CC_GCC: cc = "gcc"; break;
00049         }
00050         verbose_print(0,"%s%d/%s: ", os, caps.platform_info.bits, cc);
00051         verbose_print(0,"OPT=0x%04x SVC=%d MVC=%d EXTRA=%d", caps.opt, caps.svc, caps.mvc, caps.extra);
00052         if (caps.demo_limits.enabled)
00053         {
00054             if (caps.demo_limits.expire_enabled)
00055                 verbose_print(0," EXPIRE=%d", caps.demo_limits.expire_date);
00056         }
00057         verbose_print(0,"\n");
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 #endif
